channel.title: Editing client.java
channel.description:
I've been reading threads on editing the client.JAVA file, adding objects, changing commands etc, but when I change things nothing happens to the server. I've even deleted everything in the file, compiled, and started up the server and it still starts up fine, loggs in and everything, but still looks the same as how it was wehn I downloaded the source. (looks like nothing has been changed) as if it dosent even run of the client. java file.
I'm using Pimpscape source
Help would be appreciated.

item.title: Editing client.java
item.dc:creator: @madpassion madpassion
item.description:
@madpassion wrote:

A seperate windows error dialogue comes up with:

Could not find the main calss: antilag.java. Program will exit.

I click Ok
Then the server starts up with:

Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

Read full topic

item.title: Editing client.java
item.dc:creator: @peanut_dance peanut dance
item.description:
@peanut_dance wrote:

so um, what does it say when you compile it?

Read full topic

item.title: Editing client.java
item.dc:creator: @madpassion madpassion
item.description:
@madpassion wrote:

Yea, I’m pretty sure that’s what I do:

  1. Open client.JAVA
  2. Changed, add, delete lines of code (from other tutorials)
  3. saved using ctrl+s, file > save, and “yes” to the save request when closing the file
  4. compiled the server and ran it
  5. logged on and it’s the same as how it was before i edited it

My compiler looks like this:

@echo off
title My compiler
“C:\Program Files\java\jre6\bin\javac.exe” -cp. *.Java
“C:\Program Files\java\jre6\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Read full topic

is the compiler that you are using even working, lol?
